paragraphs.introduction:
Hi, my name is Marc and I go by Nevary online.
I am a software developer, mainly focused on frontend, always looking for new challenges and eager to learn new things.

early.title: Early years
early.content: I started programming in secondary school when i got to choose an additional subject. Out of the different options I chose IT. There I learned the basics of programming in PHP with basic HTML, CSS and later on JavaScript.

education.title: Education
education.content: After secondary school I went to university to study computer science. There I learned the basics of Java and C++ and later on Python and JavaScript.
